meanings.definition: A digestive enzyme found in the stomach that breaks down proteins.
meanings.sent1: The pepsines in the stomach help to break down the proteins in food.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study how pepsines work in the stomach to understand digestion better.
meanings.sent3: The pepsines in the stomach were having a party, breaking down proteins with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of pepsines was like a key unlocking the mystery of digestion.
meanings.sent5: The pepsines worked tirelessly, like tiny protein-cutting machines in the stomach.
